text: 27.60-61: Ais 53.9Kamata Josep, Jisasɨndu patɨ ha mɨŋata uta sava humba nuŋandɨ kɨhiyɨ tamami. Sava humba kandɨha ambahi kru tɨmbayɨ kuhanda musa mɨŋahu saŋ kɨndi. Kamatɨhihi Maria pɨhu aru Makdalandu haŋambɨ naŋga, Maria muhaŋambɨ ndahara arɨñɨ mɨnzɨta tɨhɨraramamu. Kamatɨhuhu Josep tɨmba muŋgɨ aru muŋandi tɨhuyaparahi payɨhi, kumba mɨka ha yɨvuvihɨta umi.
